description: CSP stands for Community Safety Planning. This document outlines the Standing Offer (SO) for a requirement by Public Safety Canada. The supplier must be able to provide workshop delivery for the Indigenous Community Safety Development Contribution Program in various Comprehensive Land Claim Agreements (CLCA) regions. Public Safety Canada received feedback for modification #1 - this indicates that there are submitted responses from stakeholders and feedback from the feedback process may lead to revision to Standing Offer. This document outlines the ISO 26000 (2010) certification along with business ownership to be determined as per etivation plan and actual attachments such as charter, and MOU needed by winner. The service needed is Training workshop service
tags: Indigenous comuity safety development contribution program
full_summary:
**Clcarning Safety Contribution Program**

**Request for Standing Offer**

**Reference No.**: cb-948-63421884

**Publication Date**: 20 February 2024

**Closing Date**: 26 April 2024

**Encouragement Notice**: 09 April 2024

**Context**

The Public Safety Canada invites interested proponents to submit Bids for the delivery of workshops for the Indigenous Community Safety Development Program under the Comprehensive Land Claim Agreements (CLCA) in various regions of Canada.

**Objective**

The term of this Agreement provides training workshops for CLCA recipient organizations to build capacity, develop and implement cohesive and community-based safety planning and mobilization.

**Basis of Selection**

Canada will rank and select the proposed resources according to the criteria outlined in the [Appendix A - Statement of Work].

**Regulatory and Security Requirements**

This solicitation does not contain any security requirements.

**Suppliers who wish to participate** can submit a Standing Offer bid.

**Consultations, Meetings, Conference Calls**

Interested Bidders may request an invitation to participate in Optional Offeror Engagement Sessions.

**Roles of the Parties**

The successful bidder will be responsible for managing this Standing Offer Agreement, including:

* Providing awelive facilitation substance;
* Delivering workshops for community safety development and implementation of a cohesive and community-based safety planning mobilization;
* Providing professional and respectful services to the community safety planning tragedies rotations frameworks and deliveries;
* Enacting gains that promotes integration, sense, artic criterionvanized collective idea, integrity steady turnaround norms understandably sustainable recycled universal universally ellas distinctions driving entity–O*
